title: Velo transfer ticker: Cort to Uno-X for 2024, Démare makes mid-season switch to Arkéa-Samsic
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Velo transfer ticker: Cort to Uno-X for 2024, Démare makes mid-season switch to Arkéa-Samsic on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
